description:
Revisionist History Note - This is a modern app, freshly re-written in 2022 to keep webOS users online!
Using a SSL-bump proxy enables webOS devices to access the modern Internet, where newer HTTPS encryption is usually in accessible. This app makes it easy to use the webOS Archive Proxy service -- although the app can be used with any proxy. It includes defaults and a utility for downloading the Certificate for the proxy. This app works only on devices running webOS 2.2.4 and above, where the proxy capability was added. This means Pre2 and Veer work ONLY if they've been meta-doctored to 2.2.4.

For more about using the webOS Archive Proxy, and to sign up for this free service, visit www.webosarchive.org/proxy
versionNote:
webOS Archive Proxy allows webOS 2.2.4 and up users to route Internet traffic through a SSL-Bump Proxy, stripping modern encryption so that webOS can access Internet applications and content. Supports proxies that require basic authentication
Version 1.1.4 adds support for Pre3.
Version 1.1.5 - Fix bugs for certificate download and proxy removal, layout fixes on Pre3
Version 1.1.6 - Fix username bug
Version 1.1.7 - Important changes for new domain, please disable and re-enable the proxy after installing this update.
Version 2.0.0 - Re-written for simplicity and improved error handling!
Version 2.0.1 - Addresses an issue where the proxy was not properly set if it doesn't require credentials.
